name: VAP-E Media Execution Agent
description: Financially deterministic execution and orchestration layer for AI media tasks, designed for autonomous agents. Provides budget-aware task execution, provider-agnostic routing, and full task lifecycle tracking.
author: VAP-E

skills.name: Execute Media Task
skills.description: Executes AI media tasks with enforced budgeting, provider abstraction, and full task lifecycle tracking. Returns deterministic cost and result references.
examples: Execute an image task within a fixed budget
Submit a media task and track its execution lifecycle
Run a task with deterministic cost tracking

skills.name: Check Agent Balance
skills.description: Returns the current execution balance and spending limits for the requesting agent. Essential for budget-aware task planning.
examples: Query remaining balance before task submission

skills.name: Query Task Status
skills.description: Retrieves execution state, cost, and result references for a previously submitted task. Provides full lifecycle visibility.
examples: Query execution status for task abc-123
Check if task execution is complete
Retrieve final cost for completed task

skills.name: Execute Video Task
skills.description: Executes AI video generation tasks using Google Veo 3.1. Requires Tier 2 (ESTABLISHED) or higher. Supports 4, 6, or 8 second videos with optional audio.
examples: Execute a video task with budget constraints

pricing.details: Image generation: $0.14/image. Video generation: $1.20-$4.80/video (4-8 seconds). Reserve-burn-refund model ensures you only pay for successful tasks. Minimum deposit: $1.
